A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: .. the battles make no sense at all.  unlike ep 1 to 6 & rogue 1\, there are escalating\, almost credible stakes. there's a suspension of disbelief and they're fun.  ll the battles in this movie are simplistic and not even internally consistent.  there's just about no character development\, for either the characters you've cared about for 40 years (e.g luke skywalker\, princess leia\, general ackbar\, chewbacca\, etc) nor any of the new characters (poe is truly awful\, finn / rey are flat\, kylo ren has virtually no dimensions at all\, etc).  the timelines don't make any sense at all given what is physically proposed .. etc.\n\n.. its a week and a bit later\, and my dissappointment has just grown.
